LanguageData.AS_AT_BasicResearch.label: Ancient Technology Basic Technology Research
LanguageData.AS_AT_BasicResearch.description: Research the basics of the technology used by certain ancient races from documents.
LanguageData.AS_AT_TechAdvanceResearch.label: Ancient Tech Tech Advance Research
LanguageData.AS_AT_TechAdvanceResearch.description: Collecting and researching knowledge and information about the technology used by certain ancient races to further develop it from documents, or advanced technical knowledge itself.
LanguageData.AS_AT_SpacerTechResearch.label: Ancient Technology Advanced Technology Research
LanguageData.AS_AT_SpacerTechResearch.description: Collects and researches knowledge and information about technologies used by certain ancient races to further develop them from documents, or the advanced technical knowledge itself.
LanguageData.AS_AT_BasicWeaponsTechResearch.label: Ancient Tech Basic Weapons Research
LanguageData.AS_AT_BasicWeaponsTechResearch.descripti: Research the technology used by an ancient race to create relatively inexpensive melee combat weapons, firearms, and ammunition.
LanguageData.AS_AT_AppliedGunsTechResearch.label: Ancient Technology Applied GunsTechResearch
LanguageData.AS_AT_AppliedGunsTechResearch.descriptio: Research the technology used by an ancient race to apply basic firearm technology to more advanced firearm ammunition.
LanguageData.AS_AT_GrawehrResearch.label: Ancient Technology Grawehr Analysis
LanguageData.AS_AT_GrawehrResearch.description: Research to understand the structure and mechanics of high-speed high-explosive projectile rifles, the technology used by certain ancient races, and to make it possible to manufacture Grawehr itself and special low-power bullets.
